title: Final Witness
description: Rachel Ybarra, working her way through law school as a paralegal, is hired by the United States Attorney's Office in downtown Los Angeles, just as an indictment is handed down against Jaraslov Supevsky. Supevsky is suspected of being Russian Mafia and ordering the brutal hit of a rival. The head of the criminal division, Alan Lakewood, appoints Rachel his main legal assistant for the trial.But when the government's star witness, a man being protected by the FBI, ends up dead, more questions than answers emerge. Rachel is drawn further into a web of danger and intrigue when a notorious, invisible assassin begins to make his presence felt. It becomes clear that this is more than a legal battle. It is a spiritual battle against the forces of darkness, challenging Rachel's Christian faith and putting her life on the line.Will the government's case against Supevsky survive? Will Rachel? Who will be the final witness for the truth?
author: James Scott Bell
